title: The Geist of Trend Joad 5/31: BTS, Mountain Dew, Pinocchio, Mona Lisa, Donda Sports, Stranger Things
itunes:title: The Geist of Trend Joad 5/31: BTS, Mountain Dew, Pinocchio, Mona Lisa, Donda Sports, Stranger Things
description:
In this edition of The Geist of Trend Joad, Jack and Miles discuss BTS' special message at the White House, Mountain Dew: Outpost,  the trailer for the live-action "Pinocchio". the Mona Lisa getting "defaced", Kanye founding  "Donda Sports", and "Stranger Things: Season 4" breaking viewership records (according to Netflix).

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
